languages.text: "Мало кто пережил встречу с ними, поэтому сведений у нас немного — а в рассказах уцелевших факты переплетаются с безумными домыслами. Перепуганные рабочие называют их роем, потому что они ползут по стенам и своду туннеля волной. Они говорят, что враги многочисленны и подобны насекомым. Один из рабочих, коему посчастливилось уцелеть во время атаки, вышел на поверхность. Он сошел с ума от ужаса, но в руках его был разводной ключ, покрытый странной гравировкой. Узор ее в точности повторял тот, что рисовали безумные каторжане на стенах".

traits.locale_text: "Мало кто пережил встречу с ними, поэтому сведений у нас немного — а в рассказах уцелевших факты переплетаются с безумными домыслами. Перепуганные рабочие называют их роем, потому что они ползут по стенам и своду туннеля волной. Они говорят, что враги многочисленны и подобны насекомым. Один из рабочих, коему посчастливилось уцелеть во время атаки, вышел на поверхность. Он сошел с ума от ужаса, но в руках его был разводной ключ, покрытый странной гравировкой. Узор ее в точности повторял тот, что рисовали безумные каторжане на стенах".

languages.text: "Few who have faced them have survived to tell the tale, so the information is scarce and hardly reliable — their accounts, if you will, are a jumble of facts mixed with wild speculation. The frightened workers call these monsters a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in number and resemble insects. One of the fortunate survivors, mad from the horror, emerged from the mines holding a wrench engraved with strange markings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."
languages.original_text: "Мало кто пережил встречу с ними, поэтому сведений у нас немного — а в рассказах уцелевших факты переплетаются с безумными домыслами. traits.locale_text: "Few who have faced them have survived to tell the tale, so the information is scarce and hardly reliable — their accounts, if you will, are a jumble of facts mixed with wild speculation. The frightened workers call these monsters a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and resemble insects. One of the fortunate survivors, mad from the horror, emerged from the mines holding a wrench covered with strange engravings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

"No one who met them had survived to describe them. The frightened workers call them a swarm, because they crawl along the tunnel wave. They say that the enemies are vast in numbers and are insect-like. One of the workers, who was lucky to survive the attack, came up to the surface. He has gone mad with horror, but he has been holding a wrench covered with strange engravings in his hands. The pattern was exactly the same as the one that the mad convicts have been drawing on the walls."

The pattern was exactly the same as the one the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

languages.text: “见过那些怪物的人，绝大部分都死了，所以关于它们的情报很少，也不太可靠，掺杂了很多疯狂的猜测、想象。如果您有兴趣了解的话，情况是这样的——那些被吓坏的工人称它们为黑潮，因为它们像波浪一样沿着隧道爬行。他们说敌人数量众多，看起来就像虫子一样。其中一个被吓疯了的幸存者从矿井里爬了出来，手里拿着一把刻着古怪记号的扳手，那个记号和之前那些发疯的囚犯刻在墙上的图案一模一样。”
languages.original_text: "Few who have faced them have survived to tell the tale, so the information is scarce and hardly reliable — their accounts, if you will, are a jumble of facts mixed with wild speculation. The frightened workers call these monsters a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in number and resemble insects. One of the fortunate survivors, mad from the horror, emerged from the mines holding a wrench engraved with strange markings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

traits.locale_text: “见过那些怪物的人，绝大部分都死了，所以关于它们的情报很少，也不太可靠，掺杂了很多疯狂的猜测、想象。如果您有兴趣了解的话，情况是这样的——那些被吓坏的工人称它们为黑潮，因为它们像波浪一样沿着隧道爬行。他们说敌人数量众多，看起来就像虫子一样。其中一个被吓疯了的幸存者从矿井里爬了出来，手里拿着一把刻着古怪记号的扳手，那个记号和之前那些发疯的囚犯刻在墙上的图案一模一样。”

languages.text: «Pocos de los que se han enfrentado a ellos ha sobrevivido para contarlo, por lo que la información es escasa y no muy fiable; sus relatos, me temo, son una mezcolanza de verdades y conjeturas absurdas. Los trabajadores aterrados los llaman enjambre porque se arrastran por el túnel como una ola. Dicen que los enemigos son muy numerosos y parecen insectos. Uno de los afortunados supervivientes, loco por el horror de la experiencia, surgió de las minas con una llave inglesa cubierta de marcas extrañas. El dibujo era exactamente igual al que los presos locos habían estado grabando en las paredes».
languages.original_text: "Few who have faced them have survived to tell the tale, so the information is scarce and hardly reliable — their accounts, if you will, are a jumble of facts mixed with wild speculation. The frightened workers call these monsters a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in number and resemble insects. One of the fortunate survivors, mad from the horror, emerged from the mines holding a wrench engraved with strange markings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

Uno de los afortunados supervivientes, loco por el horror de la experiencia, surgió de las minas con una llave inglesa cubierta de marcas extrañas. El dibujo era exactamente igual al que los presos locos habían estado grabando en las paredes».

languages.text: 「奴らと対峙した者のうち、生き延びて話を伝えられるた者はほとんどいません。故に情報はほとんどなく、信ぴょう性が低いのです。その証言には、事実と荒唐無稽な推測が入り混じっているので。恐れおののいた労働者たちは、奴らが波のように坑道を這っていくことから、奴らをスウォームと呼んでいます。敵の数は膨大で、昆虫のような姿だと彼らは言っています。幸運にも奴らの攻撃から生き残った労働者の一人は、恐怖で気が狂い、奇妙な刻印で覆われたレンチを手にして坑道から出てきたとのことです。その刻印の模様は、気が狂った受刑者たちが壁に刻んでいたものとまったく同じだったそうです」
languages.original_text: "Few who have faced them have survived to tell the tale, so the information is scarce and hardly reliable — their accounts, if you will, are a jumble of facts mixed with wild speculation. The frightened workers call these monsters a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in number and resemble insects. One of the fortunate survivors, mad from the horror, emerged from the mines holding a wrench engraved with strange markings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らと対峙した者のうち、生き延びて話を伝えられるた者はほとんどいません。故に情報はほとんどなく、信ぴょう性が低いのです。その証言には、事実と荒唐無稽な推測が入り混じっているので。恐れおののいた労働者たちは、奴らが波のように坑道を這っていくことから、奴らをスウォームと呼んでいます。敵の数は膨大で、昆虫のような姿だと彼らは言っています。幸運にも奴らの攻撃から生き残った労働者の一人は、恐怖で気が狂い、奇妙な刻印で覆われたレンチを手にして坑道から出てきたとのことです。その刻印の模様は、気が狂った受刑者たちが壁に刻んでいたものとまったく同じだったそうです」

languages.text: « Rares sont ceux qui les ont affrontées et qui ont survécu pour en parler, aussi les informations dont nous disposons sont-elles rares et sujettes à caution. À vrai dire, leurs témoignages sont un joyeux mélange de faits et de folles spéculations. Les ouvriers apeurés disent que ces monstres leur évoquent des "nuées", parce qu'ils envahissent les tunnels à la manière d'un raz-de-marée. Ils affirment qu'ils sont innombrables et ressemblent à des insectes. L'un des heureux survivants, fou de terreur, est ressorti des mines avec une clé gravée de symboles étranges, identiques à ceux que les détenus aliénés avaient gravés sur les murs. »
languages.original_text: "Few who have faced them have survived to tell the tale, so the information is scarce and hardly reliable — their accounts, if you will, are a jumble of facts mixed with wild speculation. The frightened workers call these monsters a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in number and resemble insects. One of the fortunate survivors, mad from the horror, emerged from the mines holding a wrench engraved with strange markings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

traits.locale_text: « Rares sont ceux qui les ont affrontées et qui ont survécu pour en parler, aussi les informations dont nous disposons sont-elles rares et sujettes à caution. À vrai dire, leurs témoignages sont un joyeux mélange de faits et de folles spéculations. Les ouvriers apeurés disent que ces monstres leur évoquent des "nuées", parce qu'ils envahissent les tunnels à la manière d'un raz-de-marée. Ils affirment qu'ils sont innombrables et ressemblent à des insectes. L'un des heureux survivants, fou de terreur, est ressorti des mines avec une clé gravée de symboles étranges, identiques à ceux que les détenus aliénés avaient gravés sur les murs. »

languages.text: "Kaum jemand hat je eine nähere Begegnung mit ihnen überlebt. Es gibt daher nur wenige Informationen über sie, und die sind nicht verässlich. Eher eine chaotische Mischung aus wenigen Fakten und wilden Spekulationen. Die verängstigten Arbeiter nennen diese Monster einen Schwarm, weil sie durch den Tunnel kriechen wie eine Welle. Sie sagen, es seien endlose Massen insektenähnlicher Kreaturen. Einer der glücklichen Überlebenden, vom Grauen in den Wahnsinn getrieben, kam mit einem sonderbaren Gegenstand aus den Minen: einem Schraubschlüssel mit einer merkwürdigen Gravur. Das Muster war dasselbe, das die wahnsinnigen Sträflinge in die Wände geritzt hatten."
languages.original_text: "Few who have faced them have survived to tell the tale, so the information is scarce and hardly reliable — their accounts, if you will, are a jumble of facts mixed with wild speculation. The frightened workers call these monsters a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in number and resemble insects. One of the fortunate survivors, mad from the horror, emerged from the mines holding a wrench engraved with strange markings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."

Das Muster war dasselbe, das die wahnsinnigen Sträflinge in die Wände geritzt hatten."

languages.text: "Karşılarına çıkan kimse sağ kurtulamamış. Ürken işçiler, tünel boyu bir dalga gibi süründükleri için bunlara sürü diyor. Kalabalık ve böceğimsi olduklarını söylüyorlar. Saldırıdan sağ çıkmayı başaran talihli bir işçi, şimdi yüzeydeymiş. Korkudan aklını yitiren adamcağızın elinde garip oymalarla kaplı bir anahtar varmış. Oymaların oluşturduğu desen, deliren mahkûmların duvarlara kazıdığıyla birebir örtüşüyormuş."
languages.original_text: "Few who have faced them have survived to tell the tale, so the information is scarce and hardly reliable — their accounts, if you will, are a jumble of facts mixed with wild speculation. The frightened workers call these monsters a swarm because they crawl along the tunnel like a wave. They say that the enemies are vast in number and resemble insects. One of the fortunate survivors, mad from the horror, emerged from the mines holding a wrench engraved with strange markings. The pattern was exactly the same as the one the mad convicts had been etching into the walls."
